Something about portals, vanishing vehicles & people and army being sent in... 'Sounds boring. Like the War of the worlds fiasco of 1938 when narrated by Orson Welles. People actually believed that was real!' You smirked at the thought of panic over a well narrated play. Little did you know the report was not a play, it was very real and you would soon find out yourself.

Just as you reached a channel you liked a blinding light poured in through the windscreen. You gasped and looked up. The light was a brilliant white and hurt your eyes. You covered your face and screamed. You was expecting there to a brief loud bang as the truck smashed into your car and crush it like a empty drinks can. But the bang never came, as the light was no truck but a portal whisking you and the surrounding traffic away to a strange new world. There was a loud whoosh and then you passed out. 1142121112.title: Wolf's Company

choices: Go through the night without incident (safe)
11421211122.content:
As the wolf showed you her rear you turn your head away.
"Jesus you could've just said so, you didn't have to show me anything" you say as the huge beast turns back around and faces you,
"Sorry" she says,
"No matter, anyway for going to escape got to find a way out of here"
"We could pretend that I killed you" the wolf says offering a suggestion "One of the guards would have to come in here and retrieve you presumably dead corpse, you could then make your way back here and open the door for me to escape,"
"No that wouldn't work" you reply "if they did retrieve me they probably throw me out in the trashcan and that could really kill me, plus even if I did manage to survive the fall it could take weeks maybe even a year or two to get back here at my size,"
"Good point" the wolf says in response, the two of you think for a little while wondering just how in the heck you're going to get out of there, as you look up you notice a vent shaft suddenly it hits you,
"hey look up there I bet that vent leads to the other side of that door,"
"How am I going to fit through that? I'm way too big" the wolf says,
"You are, i'm not I could easily fit through the vent, I could come out the other side and try to unlock the door on that end,"
"Okay we have our escape plan" the wolf says with a bit of excitement in her voice,
"Only one problem, I need a rope or something strong enough to hold me as I repelled down the side of the door" as you think you look around and see the clothing on the other two corpses that were sent in with you, "I bet the clothes on those two might be strong enough to hold my weight I could use the pants and shirts to make a rope," as you gather up the clothes from the dead you hang your head in silence to pay respect "i'm sorry this happened to you" you say "I know taking things from the dead is despicable, so please forgive me" once you have finished gathering the clothing and leaving the two corpses belongings with them you look up at your giant frend,
"Are you ready?" She asks, you take one look back at the two corpses and then nod your head, you climb up on one of the wolves giant like bat wings as she lifts you up to the vent, once there you crawl inside, It only takes you a good 20 seconds to get to the other end once there you tie one leg of the pants to a shirt and the other one to the bars, once you have finished making the rope you throw it over the other side, it's not long enough to get you to the ground safely but still long enough to reach the lock/unlock button, you slide down until you reach the button then you begin bouncing off of it trying to unlock the door, once, twice, three times you jump off the button and back again trying to unlock it,
"This time" you say gasping for breath "this time will work" you jump off hard and land on the button pushing it in and unlocking the door, the wolf burst out of the door and not a moment too soon, the pants that were holding your weight had started to rip which surprised you as you started to fall, thankfully you had landed safely on the wolfs back,
"I've got you" she says "hold on tight it's going to be a wild ride," you grab hold of her fur holding on as tight as you could, the wolf rushes through hallways and doors finally you make it to the exit, "this is it I can practically taste freedom" she says as she smashes through the door and lands on the grass "you okay back there?"
"I'm fine" you reply "just a little shaken up from the ride," the wolf then dashes is off again jumping over the electric wire into the deep dark forest.
After a couple of minutes the giant winged wolf lets you off her back, she looks at you and then starts to nuzzle you affectionately, "thank you so much, because of you I'm free, I'm finally free," the wolf says with tears running down her cheek,
"What are you going to do now that you're free?" you ask,
"I don't know, I have been locked up in the cage for so long all I thought about was getting out, don't worry I haven't forgotten about our deal, as promised you are now under my protection, I won't let anyone or anything hurt you," the wolffes then lays down "come little one you need your rest, I am a wolf but I honour my word, you are safe with me" you think about it for a little bit,
"If she wanted to kill me she would've done so already, I think, I think I can trust her" you walk up to her and snuggle with one of her paws, the wolffes smiles affectionately and then lays her big soft tail over you, you find it very hard to resist going to sleep, the wolf's fur was so soft you couldn't help but be comfortable no matter what position you were in, after a minute or two you finally give in, you close your eyes and drift off to sleep, the huge wolffes licks you tenderly and then covers both her and you under her giant bat wings as you both drift off to sleep.

Later that night you are attacked by a pack of smaller wolves looking for fresh meat.

The two of you go through the night without incident.

121122212121112112.title: You hear a loud crashing in the distance. Turns...

choices: Interrupted! The Cow is on the run from something!

1211222121211121122.content:
Everyone in your group breathed a sigh of relief. Before them was the Cow's Calf, who had been hiding in a nearby bush. The Calf had helped your group before when constructing the homes, so you knew it was not a threat. It intently watched your group standing on it's mother's back. It seem very curious and gave you all a few sniffs, but mostly let your group be.

Using the hide you had collected, you quickly completed the final construction of the small wooden structures on top of the Cow's back. With the much needed structural rigidity added, the homes would now be safe to stay in, even if the Cow was walking. Luckily, the Cow didn't seem the slightest bit bothered by the structures resting on her back. It's as if she enjoyed having all the humans safe and close to her.

Having finally finished up, you told the rest of the group the homes were ready. Many were thankful, as they would finally have a safe place to rest. Although, some people, instead of being grateful, started complaining about the odor of the Cow! This made you furious! You quickly snapped back at them, asking if they would instead prefer to be stuck on the ground, where they could easily be crushed or swallowed. The few complainers quickly went quite after that. Overall, the group started to respect you as their leader, as so far your choices seemed to be keeping everyone alive.

After that small outburst, you began to designate the homes to the people in the group. You cheekily instructed the people who had complained about the smell to take the homes at the back of the cow, near its behind. You did this to teach them a lesson, as the stench was MUCH stronger back there. They reluctantly followed your orders. Despite being daytime, everyone began to turn in and finally get some rest. People could finally sleep without worry as the group should be safe from predators on top of the Cow.

Finally, you settle into your home. You had picked the structure closest to the Cows head. Just as you enter, you feel a rumbling coming from the Cow! Suddenly, you heard the Cow unleash a massive fart! It did not take long for you to hear the people who had complained earlier. They were coughing, gagging and yelling in disgust from the putrid flatulence. "Good, serves them right!", you say to yourself. Sure, the fart still smelled awful from where you were, but you knew the Cow didn't do it on purpose, it was just part of nature. You finally lay down, giving the soft back of the Cow a gentle rub, before you quickly loose consciousness and fall into a deep sleep. Does the group finally sleep peacefully or is their slumber interrupted?
1211222121211121122.title: Home Sweet Cow

You wake up in the morning feeling refreshed, as you walk out of your hut the cow let's out a big fart which shakes the back. The people in the back groaned, but the worse was to come. The cow let of two more farts and then took a big shit which made people gag and cough from the smell. You include, even though you are towards the middle.

12112221212111211222.title: Full rest! But you can feel the Cow gently walk...

choices: Tell the group to jump up and down on its back!
121122212121112112221.content:
You decided to find the electrician first. You were worried that if the Cow wandered too far away from the vehicle's location, it would be impossible to ever track them down. You figure now was not the time to attempt collecting the fresh manure. Giving how "productive" the Cows backside seemed to be, you knew there would be much more "fertilizer" where that came from.

You soon recognized your electrician friend and walked over to him. You are surprised how easy it is to walk on the Cows back when the Cow itself is walking. You and the electrician talk for a bit, he explains he should only need a couple of hours with the help of the group to salvage the necessary parts from the vehicles. You also both agree that gaining electricity will be necessary, since their was no way the group could start a fire on the Cows back without hurting it. However, the electrician pointed out that trying to find the vehicles might be an issue. You agreed, but explain that you are hoping the Cow will instinctively return to the original grazing location where you first met. If not, then your group would have to look on foot.

Amazingly, after only half an hour of the Cow walking, the group started to recognize the area! The Cow was in fact approaching the original field you were all teleported from! It appeared that this was one of the Cows favorite places to graze. It did not take long for members of your group to spot the various vehicles sitting among the grass! They were all parked together in front of the Cow. Fortunately, they appear to be untouched from when you last left them. This does make sense, as wild animals wouldn't be interested in what are essentially toy cars.

Unfortunately, the same goes true for the Cow. Suddenly, you hear a red sports car get crushed under her hoof. She reduced it to nothing more then a sheet of metal. Immediately after, you hear the same with a green minivan. The Cow was paying no attention to the vehicles and simply kept on walking forward, flattening them! Your groups celebration soon broke into a panic. If they didn't act soon, she would unknowingly crush all the vehicles!

You need to stop the Cow, do you:
121122212121112112221.title: Bovinae Road Rage

choices: A small predator attacks the group
1211222121211121122211.content:
You heard more vehicles get flattened, you had to get the Cow to stop, and fast! You raced over to the Cows head, quickly climbing her short neck. You flopped onto her furry forehead and began to gently rub it lovingly. The Cow stopped in her tracks. She let out a loving "Moo!", if felt nice to be petted! It did not take long for the relaxing feeling to coax the Cow into folding its legs and laying down. The rest of your group hangs on for dear life as the Cow plops down onto the field. After a few more minutes of rubbing, the Cow seemed to understand that the small creatures on her back wanted off, for the time being. She gently used her muzzle to bring you, the electrician, and the rest of the group onto the ground.

Once you were off the Cow, your group quickly realized the Cow had crushed over half the vehicles with her mighty belly and utters when she laid down. Some of these vehicles were still somewhat visible, with half the cars body sticking out at the edge of her soft skin. Someone suggested those vehicles could still be useful if they told the Cow to stand back up. Just as that was said, the Cow shifted slightly to get more comfortable. She ended up covering and flattening whatever vehicles were half crushed with her mighty underside, making them all unusable. Fortunately, the electrician piped up and explained that the remaining half of the vehicles the Cow had missed would be more then enough to salvage from. Your group let out a sigh of relief. Well, most of it did.

The complainers from before (the ones you had condemned to the back of the Cow) came up to you furiously! They were angrily yelling that the "stupid dumb Cow" had crushed their car with its utters. They were planning to grab their designer sunglasses and purse from inside their vehicle. They kept going on about how you needed to reimburse them for their destroyed property. You tried your best to ignore them, rubbing your temples to relive the headache they were causing. You were really starting to get annoyed with those people, they really needed to be put in their place.

With the electricians help, you organize people into smaller groups and began salvaging the parts. Alternators, wiring, batteries, fans and headlights were all starting to get dismantled from the vehicles. Everyone was actually working quite well together, apart from more whining by the you-know-whos. The Cow curiously looked upon everyone working. To her, you look like little ants collecting food! Unfortunately, the Cow and your group were so focused, that no one was paying attention to their surroundings. Does a predator use this chance to attack your group?
1211222121211121122211.title: Innocent Vehicular Destruction

12112221212111211222112.content:
You and the electrician named Jones grouped up and called over people to show them what they need to grab off the cars. You pointed out the alternator, batteries, cables, lights. And the heating system. Which was going to be the hardest. You also say there possible is a repair kit in the trunk of the car, or maybe in a work truck.
You send people on their way, and look in the back of the red ford escape and lift up a compartment in the back. You find a repair kit with wrenches, sockets and ratchets. You grab the bag and move back to the front of the vehicle and lift the hood. The hood creaked open and snapped into place. You grab a wrench and socket with a ratchet and start working on the alternator.
People struggled at first, being city folks they usually just sent it off to someone to fix so they struggled. Someone called you over for help, and you did. They didn't know how to get the alternator off. (Was one of those tiny smart cars that's impossible to work on)
You laughed a little and said not to bother with that car, they are a pain in the ass.
You suggested they work on the Tahoe over there.
You walk over with them to get them going, you popped the hood and looked in and spotted it. You then set them up with the proper sizes and tools to take it off.
You walk back to your red ford and find that Jones has gotten the rest of the alternator off, and grabbed all the wiring from it. You then grab the battery, disconnecting red and then black to avoid shock. You then lifted it out of the housing. You decide to use the hoods to carry all of the parts over to the cow what was watching intently. Your big brain also thought it would be alot easier to weld the hoods together to have a bigger area to carry thing on.
You grabbed a few batteries and wired them up in a series. You then grabbed the black wire and grounded it on the hood, got another hood to your desired position and then started taping the red wire across the seems on the hood. This effectively made a weld and held the hood together. It creates lots of sparks, bright lights, and lots of noise. The massive bovine and never seen this before and jumped up and ran off a little bit causing massive shockwaves, bouncing vehicles and causing people to fall. The angry people from before shouted at you for scaring it, and causing them to fall. You tell the to shut the hell up. And they would probably be dead by now if we had to stay on the ground.
You felt the slow tremors of the cow walking back slowly and cautiously, making sure you were done using that wizardry. You walk back to your vehicle and help Jones again and told him what you did.

This is getting a bit long and boring. How about I skip ahead to when you and the group are done with getting parts
And I'm also on mobile so my thumbs are cooked and need a break lol

His hind paws laying on their sides showing off thick black cracked pads. His claws were several times longer than you. Further back was his belly and down lower his huge heavily furred sheath and balls. His privates clearly old and sagged rested on the ground, his balls bigger than houses and the sheath was bigger than a bus. ''Damn'' you said at the sight of his rather large features.


You lifted your eyes up to look up at his head. He was staring down, grinning. You gulped as it turns out the big old Dire Wolf is...
132131.title: He speaks and sits down

1321311.content:
''Hi, I'm Silver. Your new best friend!'' Said the Wolf happily. His tongue started to lull out of his mouth. You gasped at his words. 'I hope he's not lying!' you thought to yourself. You could hear loud swooshing from beyond the Wolf. You glanced down and past him. His huge tail was swishing rapidly side to side. Leaves and twigs the size of buses were blown about by his wagging tail. A few people screamed and started to run away. ''Ooh There's no need to run from me!'' Laughed Silver. He groaned and began to lie down. His large forepaws slid forwards as his belly lowered to the ground. His huge claws gouged up the earth as they slid forth. Despite there huge size Silver doesn't crush anybody or any vehicle with his paws. ''Seriously there is no need to run!'' He cried after the running people. He snorted when they didn't stop, you glanced back at the people and back at the gigantic Wolf laying before you. ''More of my pack will pick you up!'' He said then he sighed and looked down... Right at your car! You gulped and slid down further into your seat as his blue eyes gazed right at you.

''Oh hello there! Why don't you come out of that thing?'' Said Silver. You was to shocked and scared to act. The Wolf lowered his head towards your car, until his muzzle filled the screen. ''Come on. I won't hurt you, I promise!'' He said, whilst smiling and still wagging his huge tail. You gulped and slowly reached for the door handle... You slowly opened the door. You stepped out and looked into the face of the giant Wolf. ''What do you want with us?'' You asked the giant Wolf. ''To take you back to my pack. Plus there's more for you humans when we get back. But it'll be easier to show you. Now, if you'd allow me to place you on my back...'' Explained Silver he opened his mouth. Warm, humid and stinky breath washes over you. His huge pink tongue slipped out and came at you. ''No stop!'' You cried as you backed up from his approaching tongue.

''Don't worry, i'm not going to eat you. I just want to place you on my back. This is the easiest way for now.'' He replied. You sighed ''Ok. go ahead'' His huge tongue curls around you and emraces you in it's powerful embrace. It was sticky, squishy and hot. He lifted his head and true to his word he drops you on his back. ''See, not so bad! Now if the rest of you would kindly let me pick you up. I'm quite old so if you would be so kind not to run. Or better yet if you come closer that would be great!'' Said Silver as he lowered his head for more people...


So do other people cooperate or do they all run?
1321311.title: Meet Silver, the friendly old Dire Wolf

13213112.content:
Having seen the giant Wolf lick up another person the other people all scream and run away! The fact he was clearly just being friendly doesn't cross their minds. Silver yipped with surprise as the people screamed and ran. ''Hey! Wait he has not hurt me!'' You called after them from atop his back. It had no effect, the others ran on. You sighed. ''Are you going after them?'' You asked Silver. ''No. I'm much too old to be running about after people. My other packmates will get them though.'' You felt a little worried. ''Is the rest of your pack friendly?'' Silver looked back at you. ''Of course! Just they are younger than an old fart like me. Now hold on, I'll get back up.'' You gasped and grabbed hold of his fur. 'hmm... why does he speak like that?' you thought. His body shook as he rose up to his full height. You couldn't belief how weird the view felt from up here. It was more like a forest should look like. But down far below was your car and other vehicles, that looked like toys.
''Now, I'll take you back to the pack. You'll be surprised, I guarantee it!'' said Silver happily as he started to walk back into the forest.


As he walked his joints clicked away. ''Grrr… Fuck.... Old age!'' He grumbled as he walked along. His whole body shook, so you couldn't speak to him. You was to busy holding onto his fur and listening to his grumbling. Ahead of you his large shoulder blades rose up and down as he walked along. After fifteen minutes he came to a stop atop a hill looking down into a valley. ''Have a look down there.'' he said as he turned to let you look down into the valley. You gasped at the sight down below in the valley to see at the bottom was...


1)A large pack of Dire Wolves!

2) A village with humans and the Dire Wolves walking about!
13213112.title: Journey alone

132131122.content:
At the bottom of the valley was a village of wooden huts and fields. You could see people walking about. 'They weren't with us before'' you thought. But walking about the village was more of giant Dire Wolves like Silver. They were carefully walking about the buildings and people. There was a very large black furred Dire Wolf laying just outside the village, people were talking with him it seemed. ''That's the pack alpha, Shadow'' Said Silver as he spotted you looking at him. You didn't reply and continued to study the scene below. A snow white Wolf was sat near to Shadow. There was people stroking her paws and belly. ''What is this?!'' You asked Silver. ''Many years ago. With my great grandfather he found you humans in the forest. They was brought here by something called a 'portal' he looked after them and it was discovered that there is no way back to your world. So they formed a village with his pack. It was an mutual arrangement. We care for them, they help us out. Be it cleaning us, stroking us or just having some social interaction. When I was a young male I was alpha. I've rescued several of your kind before, all of whom were 'portaled' here. We then take you to the village for your safety.'' Explained Silver.

You was shocked. There was no way home. So it seemed you'd be living in the village with the other humans and these giant Dire Wolves. ''So the others that ran from you, will your pack mates bring them here?'' You asked. Silver nodded. ''Yes. They may have to be a bit more forceful than me, but they won't harm them. Ah, Thunder approaches with some of your people now.'' You and Silver looked back to see a Grey furred male emerge from the forest. His mouth was bulging. ''Is he holding them in his mouth?!'' You cried. Silver nodded ''It appears so... I hope you didn't swallow any, Thunder!'' Said Silver. Thunder glared at him with an 'as if!' look. Thunder walked on past Silver and headed for the village. Silver followed. ''Let's introduce you to the others now.''


The two Dire Wolves headed to the village. As they approached other Dire Wolves came up to greet them. People ran up after them, they got left behind by the far larger Wolves. Silver stopped as did Thunder. ''New arrivals!'' He yelled. Before the other Wolves reached him there was a loud ear splitting howl. It was coming from Shadow, the alpha. The large black furred male was running towards you. ''Give room!'' He barked at the other Wolves. Who backed up from Silver and Thunder. You was a little apprehensive. Silver was big but Shadow was even bigger and more intimidating! ''Don't be afraid of him, he's bigger than me and stronger but he is quite friendly'' You was a little reassured. Before you knew it Shadow was standing before you and Silver. ''Ah. New arrivals. I see one on your back and Thunder has a mouthful... Thunder release them in the village with the other humans. Now Silver, I guess this human wasn't as scared of us as Thunder's lot were?'' He asked. Silver Nodded ''He was the only one that let me pick him up, the others ran'' he explained. Shadow grinned at you. ''So brave. I like that. You'll fit in quickly. A tour is order for you human'' He said. ''A tour? What about the others?'' You asked. Shadow grinned ''A tour for you. The others as they are clearly still scared will be left with other humans to reassure them first. You get a solo introductory tour. Your tour guide will be....''
132131122.title: A human/Dire Wolf village

1321311221.content:
''As you and old Silver seem to be getting on together. He can give you a tour of the village. Now I'll go and deal with these other new arrivals, excuse me''. The large alpha Wolf turned and headed towards Thunder and the other members of your group. ''I'll show you around. Relax, the others won't be harmed and will soon join our pack'' said Silver as he started to walk into the village. He stopped and looked down at a load of huts. You studied the huts. They were mostly made of wood, straw, mud and the occasional sheet of metal. The metal was clearly the remains of vehicles. The villagers wore a mix of tatty clothing from previous time periods and newly made clothes made of wool. The villagers waved up at you happily, shouting various welcomes and greetings. ''Amazing... I'm guessing that I'll get a hut as well?'' You asked Silver. He nodded. ''You sure will, we'll sort that out later. Now we'll move on to the next part of the village.'' The old Wolf headed past dozens of these make shift huts. Other Wolves walked on by, of course carefully step over huts and people. Most of the Wolves were carrying people, you soon realised that the Wolves only carried 1-4 people at a time. ''Why is it the other Wolves are carrying so few people?'' You asked Silver. ''Oh, each Wolf is partnered with a single man. But also if that man takes a wife and has kids the Wolf will care for the family.'' You was surprised by this news. ''So, does that mean you and I will be....'' ''Partners?'' Interrupted Silver. ''Why yes it does!'' He laughed. 'Well at least I know him already' you thought to yourself.

Silver soon reached the fields. Many were working on picking crops and planting them. ''Here is where you humans grow your food. We Wolves help out as you can see''. Two stocky black furred Wolves were using there long claws to plough the ground. Nearby people waited to sow some seeds. ''You will help out in the future as well. All humans and Wolves help out in every place'' explained Silver. ''Hey! Is that a new arrival?'' Called up a man. Silver nodded. ''Yes. On tour at present'' he replied. The man sighed ''Ah okay! You'll soon get used to this life!'' He said cheerfully then resumed his work. You was watching the people farm when one of the Wolves caught your attention. The Wolf was quite fat and sat by the field that was being ploughed by the other two. He was panting happily and for good reason. His large sheath and balls were resting on the ground and being stroked by several people. ''What's going on there!?'' You cried. Silver grinned sheepishly. ''Oh... We erm, found that our cum is good for fertilising the soil. When the ploughing is done we... spread our seed on the earth before you humans spread your seeds for crops.'' You shook your head in disbelief. ''Have you done this?'' You asked. Silver sighed. ''Yes. But I'm to old for that thing now. All my dick is good for is pissing and shooting dust.'' He started to walk on, his old body clicking the wholetime 'No surprise there!' You thought to yourself.

He next took you to a windmill just outside the village. It was made up of old vehicles and wood. Two Wolves were sat either side of it, watching the land beyond intently. ''Here you humans mill your grain. As the windmill is outside the village we always have tow guards here just in case. We Wolves help carry the grain back and forth when needed.'' He then turned and walked towards the river. that ran right past the village. ''Here is where we get our water of course. It is for drinking and washing.'' You watched some people bathing in the river. Nearby a Wolf was lapping up the water. ''Has anybody been lapped up by accident?'' You asked. Silver laughed. ''Yes. But we never swallow!'' You cringed but didn't reply. He turned and headed back towards Shadow and the other people. ''Well that's a quick tour done. Let's see how the others are doing''.

Shadow, several other Wolves and villagers were surrounding the other people. When you and Silver arrive you find that the other people...
1321311221.title: A quick tour

13213112211.content:
The others were still panicking. They pushed away villagers trying to talk to them. The Wolves were being submissive and talking softly to no avail. ''Damn, why are they being so stubborn?!'' You said to Silver. ''I don't know. We have had difficult introductions before but this is the first where all people have been difficult to talk to. Apart from you of course.'' You sighed. ''Maybe I should try to talk with them....'' Silver nodded. ''Perhaps that is best. I shall speak to Shadow.'' He headed over to the huge alpha. ''Maybe my human can hep out here Shadow.'' Suggested Silver. Shadow nodded ''I agree. This introduction is not going well.'' You plucked up the courage to speak to the huge alpha. ''Maybe you Wolves should back up for now?'' You suggested. Shadow glared at you. You gulped and cowered. He looked angry but then his expression eased. ''Perhaps you are right.'' He sighed. ''Silver, lower your human. The rest of you Wolves. Back away!'' Ordered Shadow. Silver crouched down and you slid off down his leg. Once off of him he stood back up and towered over you. ''Good luck!'' He said then he backed up, as did the other Wolves. You watched the giant canines for a few moments before looking back down at the group of people who had been brought here with you. You sighed and stepped forth...

The villagers let you through. They muttered several good lucks. The other people were bunched together, wielding sticks. ''Get back!'' They cried. Swiping with their sticks. ''Knock it off! I'm one of you!'' You cried. ''Your in league with these beasts, aren't you?!'' Yelled a man. Who you recognised as being the man that led the first outing into the woods. ''What bullshit! I'm in the same situation as you're in! I've been shown around the village by one of these so called 'beasts'. They have formed a bonding with these other people. Who like us were brought here by portals in the past. There is no way back. We must adapt to this new life.'' You yelled back in response. Some of the people seemed to calm down at your words. But a few were still angry and having none of it.

''You lie!'' Roared the man with the stick and he came for you! You backed up and prepared to be violently attacked but you are saved by...
13213112211.title: A difficult situation

132131122111.content:
The man raised the stick over his head as he came at you. You cringed and help your arms to try and stop the stick but without warning ''Drop that stick right now!'' Roars a loud voice that shook your bones. The man skidded to a halt and screamed as he looked up and past you. The ground shook and a large white paw lands beside you. The paw, despite its great size came down softly so not to blow you over. You gawp up at the paws owner, a great white she-Wolf. She lowers head at the man, he gulped and backed up but she still went for him. ''Now that won't do, will it? Attacking your own. I shall have none of that. I'll deal with you myself!'' She said as she licked up the man. ''Hey! You aren't going to eat him?!'' You cried. She looked at you and snorted. Her mouth being sealed with the man within meant she couldn't speak. She backed up then laid down. Her great legs slid around either side of you and the others, forming a pen. She lowers her head and spits out the man, who was soaked in a liberal amount of drool. He was shivering uncontrollably. Some of the others beat on her legs, begging to be released. ''Now, don't be silly. You'll never get through. Why not come stroke my chest fur instead?'' She said softly. You approached her chest and stroked at the fur. It was so soft and warm... ''See! She just wants to be pet!'' You yell at the others. The she-Wolf groaned contently. ''Yes....Stroke me!'' She panted happily and lulled her tongue. Finally the others started to gingerly approach and stroke at her chest. ''She is soft'' ''A big pup really'' ''Not a beast after all'' was some of the comments you heard from the other people.


The ground pounds as Shadow, Silver and a few other Wolves appear. ''Well. Always the charmer, Snow'' said Shadow grinning. ''Should of just let her deal with them in the first place'' said Silver, laughing. ''Oh stop it you two, just jealous!'' She replied to the two males. Shadow went to speak. But there was a loud distant howl... Then others. Shadow snarled ''We're under attack! Rally the pack!'' He turned and ran off, as did the other Wolves. Silver remained as did Snow. ''What is attacking?!'' You asked the two canines. ''It's_________'' replies Silver.
132131122111.title: Saved by a Wolf

1321311221111.content:
''It's Sabretooths! Again they attack!'' Replied Silver. You gulped 'there's giant sabretooths here as well?!' You thought. ''There's sabretooths here as well?!'' Screamed a woman. Silver snorted ''yes, a pride of them has been trying to invade our territory for a few years now. Now quickly follow us to a safer location!'' Ordered Silver. He turned and headed into the village. Already the native people were gathering together deep in the village. Several were wielding spears. ''Let's go!'' You cried and followed Silver. The other people followed. Snow led up the rear. You could hear distant howls, snarls, growls and roars. ''Hurry! This is no ordinary raid!'' yelled Silver. You all ran to meet with the natives. Several other Dire Wolves stood around them protectively. You all safely reach the natives and form in a great group. ''Is it safe to be gathered in one place like this?'' You asked a local man. ''Yes, the Wolves have always kept the predators away. But you are young, you should have a spear!'' He handed you a spear, which was made of wood with a sharp metal head, that looked like it was from a vehicle. ''How will these stop a giant?!'' You muttered. Around you spears were being handed out to all young men and women. Around you loomed Silver, Snow and four other Dire Wolves. ''Stay together!'' Ordered one of the other Dire Wolves, a large black furred male.

Suddenly outside of the village a gigantic sabretooth flew out of the forest! It tripped on landing, ending up rolling over several times. It quickly scrambled back onto its feet giving you a good view of the beast. It was even larger than Shadow, the biggest Dire Wolf. The shoulders thickly muscled and of course two great sabres jutted out of it's mouth. Your mouth dropped in shock. Some people screamed. The huge beast looked this way. It let off a blood curdling roar. From the forest emerged a 'small' brown Dire Wolf, who had just dodged the sabretooth's attacking leap. The Sabretooth looked at it's original target and you all. It snarled and charged...
1321311221111.title: Attack of the Sabretooths

13213112211111.content:
To your terror the gigantic beast turned and started to charge at you all! ''Oh shit!'' You and several others cried. The large black furred male snarled and charged at the sabretooth. Snow ran with him. ''You won't get them!'' She growled as she ran. The three giants charged at each other. You shivered with fear then you saw two more of the giant sabretooths emerge from the forest to the right. They ran right for Snow and the other Dire Wolf. ''Look out!'' Snarled Silver. Two more Wolves ran after Snow. Snow spotted the two other cats and she ducked as they leapt for her. Both missed due to her dodge. The black furred male made a sudden turn and grabbed hold of one of the sabretooths hind legs. The sabretooth roared as its leg was pierced by the Wolfs fangs. Using his momentum the black dire Wolf tossed his head and flung the sabretooth right into the one charging at him. Both cats slammed into each over violently. knocking them out. But the third sabretooth had recovered and before she could react it leapt onto Snow! With ease it pinned her down and sunk it's sabres into her neck. ''No!'' You, Silver and several others cried.

Snow yelped as she was pinned by the far larger and powerful sabretooth. It's sabres started to pierce into the back of her neck. Blood flowed, staining her brilliant white fur. But before it could bite in to deep the sabretooth was knocked off by the two other Dire Wolves. They set on it as did the black furred male. They killed the cat and set on the other two unconscious ones. Snow got up slowly and made her way back. She was bleeding heavily from the two puncture wounds. Silver ran to help her back. He licked at her wounds. ''Get the vets!'' He growled. You saw several people run to meet them with what looked like giant bandages and stitches. She laid down and Silver helped the 'vet's onto her back. They quickly tossed the bandages onto the wounds and held them down. But the attack was not over. Three more sabretooths charge from the forest. The black furred male and the two other Wolves charge at them the sabretooths turned and re-entered the forest. With the three Wolves on their tail.

Now all that remained was the injured Snow, Silver and one Dire Wolf. The male who had been 'seeding' the fields. ''This is bad...'' You whined as you looked around. Then you saw them, two sabretooths were charging from the other side of the village. ''Over there!'' You cried. You all looked at the two sabretooths as they started to tear through the village. Crushing houses under their paws as they ran. Everyone started to panic and run in all directions. The sabretooths leapt and landed on the male Dire Wolf. With a sickening crunch bones were shattered and four long sabres sunk into the Wolf. Blood sprayed everywhere. With a heavy crash the three beasts slam down and slide. Crushing many houses and people. Silver snarled and leapt into action. He grabbed the back of one of the sabretooths necks and shook. The sabretooth snarled and released it's grip on the downed Wolf. It turned violently and flicked the elderly Wolf off with ease. Silver landed nearby. He lay motionless. The sabretooth stomped towards him. It lowered its head towards his neck and opened it's maw wide. You ran at the beast and with all your might threw your spear. ''No you don't you fucker!'' You cried. The spear sailed through the air and pierced the sabretooths eye! It ley out a blood curdling roar and thrashed about. ''Fuck!'' You cried and ran as the beast stomped around in agony. You struggled to remain standing as the ground was shaking so hard. The Sabretooth focused on you and roared at you as it came after you! ''Shit!'' You cried as you ran from the enraged beast...

What happens next?
13213112211111.title: Bloody fight in the village

132131122111112.content:
''I'll fucking tear you apart!'' Roared the sabretooth as it came for you. You ran into a nearby hut. It had two doors you was halfway through when the wall exploded as several sharp claws sunk in. You ducked as the paws swipe right through the hut, completely tearing up the structure. Overhead loomed the Sabretooth. It snarled down at you. Saliva poured from its jaws and landed around you. You got up and ran. A paw slams down before you, blowing you back. ''I always toy with my victims!'' Laughed the Sabretooth. It slammed his paw down again, blowing you right under his backside. Under his short tail was two large orbs. ''Oh I'm going to crush you with my balls!'' He laughed and folded his legs. You got up and ran and just in time. His rump slammed down behind you. Blasting you forwards. ''Missed! Oh well Another... Fuck!'' The sabretooth got up and ran. The other one joined him He glared back at you over his shoulder with his ruined eye ''I'll get you for this!'' He ran on back into the forest.

You heard heavy footsteps and several barks. It was Shadow and the rest of the pack. There was many injuries. They came up to Snow, Silver and the dead male. You ran to Silver. He grumbled and sat up. ''My head!'' He moaned. ''Are you okay?'' You asked him. ''He nodded, yes, just a little dazed.'' He looked at the dead male nearby ''Shit. I tried to save him. I thought I was a goner, what saved me?'' He asked. A man came up and patted you on the shoulder. ''He did! Speared the sabretooth right in the eye!'' You shrugged ''Yes, but it nearly got me in return!'' Before you could react a great wet tongue wraps around you and soaks you in liberal amounts of drool. It was Silver licking you affectionately. ''Aww thank little one!'' He groaned as he continued his licking assault, ignoring your protests. You sighed and accepted his affections.

After he'd stopped licking you all gathered up to survey the damage from the attack. Two Wolves and thirty three people dead, seven Wolves and twelve people injured and half the village was levelled. ''The sabretooths hit hard! But we repelled them! Now a howl for the fallen!'' Said Shadow. All the Wolves threw back their head and howled mournfully. ''There is much work to be done. We must bury the dead and rebuild the village! Let's get to it!'' Ordered the large Alpha. Several Wolves carried the dead away and started to dig graves outside the village with the aid of people. Others started to pick up the debris and look at rebuilding. Snow walked up to you and Silver. She was a little wobblily. ''Are you okay?'' You asked her. She nodded. Just stings a little, but the vets stitched me up. I saw you save Silver, very brave!'' She lowered her head to you and nuzzled you gently. You patted her muzzle. ''Yes, I couldn't just let him get killed!'' You replied. She lifted her head. ''They've never attacked like this before. It's getting worse!'' She sighed. Silver growled. ''We should take the fight to them!'' Snow nodded. ''Perhaps but now, we should rebuild and bury the dead''. She turned and started to check on other people. Shadow came up. ''I heard you saved Silver and took out one of their eyes. How brave of you!'' You nodded as the large male lowered his head to you. ''You'll get to have another pop at them later. But now you and Silver can help by....''
132131122111112.title: Return of the pack

choices: On the way to your destination
1321311221113.content:
"Justin!" Snow called and a human came beside you dressed in tribal clothes. "Get the new comers to safety sweetie." The man nodded. "Follow me everyone!" The man shouted. All the others followed the man without question even the one who tried to attack you followed. You did your best to keep at front almost along side of the man leading you all.

Things seemed to be going pretty. "Looks like the fighting is nowhere near here huh?" You said to Justin. "Yeah our big wolf friends are pretty tough I doubt a single one of the attackers will get close to this place." The man said confidently and giving a small smile. Out of nowhere something big jumped right in front of the group. You and Justin were blown away by the shockwave however you seemed to have rolled further away from Justin.

You looked up and saw the man was already standing up. "Damn, he sure is tough." You thought getting up. Justin seemed like he was about to say something when a huge black paw slammed down on the man. You winced at the crunch like noise. "Shit, I squashed one!" A loud masculine voice said from above. Looking up you saw the face of a black furred wolf. His eyes were a bright yellow and on his face were scars no doubt old wounds.

The big male looked away from his paw and saw everyone else including you. "Oh, well I didn't expect to find so many of you little guys here." He said his voice filled with surprise and happiness. "Ohh alpha will definitely be pleased with my catch!" To your and everyone else's horror the wolf opened his mouth wide and bent down. His thick saliva coated tongue smashed into you all dragging you up inside his mouth. The big wolfs cheeks slightly puffed out from the mass of bodies inside his maw.

The unknown wolf suddenly took of running with his prize.
1321311221113.title: Another pack of Wolves

choices: The alpha appeared before she could pick
13213112211132.content:
Suddenly you were all blinded by a bright light and the big tongue beneath you sloped down acting as a slide. You and what remained of the others landed on the ground. Groaning in pain you looked up and saw a woman was still inside the wolfs mouth she was trying to crawl out but the wolf closed his mouth before she could even get close. Whether he was aware of her presence or just didn't care you couldn't tell.

The ground began to thump and two elderly looking wolves apprached. The biggest seemed to be a black and grey colour and smaller was a dark brown colour. "Ah, greeting Ren and Nenma." The wolf said respectfully. "I see you were successful in your hunt Seth." The brown one said in a feminine voice. Clearly it was female. "Yep, I'm just waiting for the alpha."

The old male looked down at the group of cowering human and grinned. "I dont suppose you'd let us to elders take one or two before he get here do you?" The grey old walk asked giving the black wolf known as Seth the puppy eyes. The younger male hummed in thought. "This is bad." You thought looking around hoping to find an escape root.

"Very well, but only two." Your heart sank as both the old wolves grinned their tails wagging in excitement. "Which do you think my love?" The male asked his mate. Nenma looked at the shivering group of humans her eyes scanning over each individual until finally she chose.....
13213112211132.title: At your destination

132131122111321.content:
“I want him.” Nenma Points with her paw at the same man who tried to attack you earlier. The man screamed and tried to run but Seth flicked the man towards the two wolves. You winced at the sight of the man rolling to a stop. “That had to hurt.” You thought.

The man tried to crawl away but was quickly slurped up by the old male. The female looked at you all once again. Her eyes met yours and she had a strange look on her face. It was a look of want like a child who saw this really cool action figure they wanted.

“And him!” Nenma said loudly making her mate jump. “Seth looked down at you. You knew what he was about to do and didn’t fancy getting flicked like the other guy so you got up and hesitantly walked towards Nenma. All three of the wolves were shocked at your actions but Nenma seemed almost ecstatic. You waited to be slurped up too but to your surprise the old female gently picked you up with her teeth and placed you right on her backside.

“Well have fun you two.” Seth chuckled as the two walked off. The trip was a little bumpy for you as the old bitches butt rise and fell with every step she took.

After sometime you were......
132131122111321.title: You and someone else

1322.content:
Your heart jumped into your throat at the site of this massive creature that was following the group of people that were heading straight for you! You frantically began to try and turn your car on but it was no good, the group of people ran by your car several of them got inside empty cars hoping to hide from the wolf.

Thump thump thump

The creature walking after the people was a canine. It looked like a Fox it's fur was a brilliant white that glowed in the sunlight. But swishing behind the Fox was not one, or two or five but nine tails! ''A... A Kitsune?!'' You muttered in disbelief. The Kitsune stopped now it was in sight of you all. It silently studied your group. It looked at the fleeing people its eyes flashed. Blue fire appeared at the tips of the Fox's tails. ''Stop!'' Ordered the Kitsune as it swished one of its tails through the air. A wall of blue flames flies out from the tail. You gasped and ducked, watching the flames pass overhead. The flames formed a long barrier before the fleeing people, who skidded to a halt. The flames did not appear to be igniting the grass they were on. The Kitsune was clearly using powerful magic here. You looked back at the Kitsune, who looked satisfied with the fact it had stopped the others from running. You knew little of Kitsune lore but you was sure that they could actually be benevolent, mischievous or out right malicious.

This Kitsune turns out to be...

1353141.content:
The Kitsune grinned slightly. ''In all my many years I have never seen such creatures as yourself. You must be a gift from the great spirit. therefore, it's my duty to care for you until we can meet her.'' Your mouth dropped in disbelief. Being transported to a giant world, encountering a giant mythical creature who could speak and use magic. Now this creature wanted to care for you and show you to some spirit?! ''What's going on here?!'' You yelled at the Kitsune. You gasped and covered your mouth. You'd just said that out loud! The Kitsune looked right at you ''You are in the great spirit's forest. You must be here as her guest. My duty therefore is to take you to her. As her guests It is my duty to care for you until we meet her.'' You nodded at the Kitsune's explanation of this situation. But you was still in a state of shock. The others started to speak up ''But why?'' ''Who is this spirit?!'' ''How will you 'care' for us?!'' The Kitsune shook his head at the many questions ''Silence!'' He boomed. Everybody shut up. A few fainted. But the Kitsune did not looked angry, more irritated at the many questions. ''Now. It is time to get going. This won't hurt, I assure you.''


'What does it mean by that?' You wondered. The Kitsune's nine tails curled up over its back and came down over you all. You gasped as the tails blocked out the light. They were so long and thickly furred. A tail landed over a group of people nearby and lifted. They were gone, but trapped in the tail. Then thick fur smothers you and entangles itself about you. You couldn't even scream as your entangled in fur then lifted up. Despite the thickness of the fur it was soft and you could still breathe. You tried to move, but you was completely entangled by the fur. ''My apologies to you all for the traveling arrangements. But I hope my tails are pleasant to be in?'' Said the Kitsune as he began to walk into the forest, with everybody safely trapped in his tails. 'What a fucked up day' you though to yourself as you gave up resisting. This was happening and there was nothing you could do about it.

But the question were was the Kitsune taking you?

135314121112.content:
The huge fox turned her head down as she gave the Kitsune his instructions. "Take them all somewhere nice and begin questioning when they are ready," she said to the kitsune before turning to look at the group of small humans. Her piercing green eyes scanned over the group for a second until they landed on you. "Except that one."

A jolt of fear went up your spine. Her eyes were so large that it would have been difficult telling who she was looking at but for some reason you couldn't think that she was staring specifically at you. The fox kept her gaze on you as the Kitsune moved over the group and picked them up with his tails like he did before. You felt the fur brush against you but unlike last time, you were left on the ground by yourself. Once the nine-tailed fox picked up the rest of the humans he leisurely trotted away deeper into the forest leaving you alone with the godlike fox.

You could feel your knees getting wobbly as she took slow, careful steps towards you. Before you had the security of the crowd to help you muster the courage to ask the giant animals questions but now it was just you and a fox so large it was comparable to a mountain. You were running over what possible reason she singled you out of the group in your head; did you upset her somehow? Did you say something you shouldn't have? The tremors were getting closer. Despite her attempt at being slow and careful you could feel her weight pressing down into the earth with each step she took. Soon you were craning your head up as she stood over you and fell on your back when her furry form suddenly began lowering.

Sitting back up the fox seemed to dominate most of your peripheral vision, her arms acting like two huge impassible walls while to the front of you a pointed muzzle was smiling at you. You jumped when she started talking because while she was trying to be soft-spoken her size and proximity was amplifying it to an unbearable level. She noticed and talked even softer. "There is no need to fret," she said. "I just wanted to have a one-on-one interaction with one of your kind."

"Why me, though?" You ask.

"You seemed quite brave asking my child and I those questions. I could see being before such large creatures a daunting experience."

It was daunting. Hearing that she didn't single you out because of anything bad made you feel more at ease, though. "Okay. Did you want to ask me anything?"

The fox seemed happy with your compliance. "Do you have any animals in your world that resemble us in any way? What I gleamed through the portal wasn't clear but I could swear I could recognize many species that look the same as the ones here."

"I've only seen you and the nine-tailed fox so far but there is an animal that looks like you. Just much, much smaller."

"Yes, judging from the other beings I've brought to this world it would seem we're the exception to the rule in terms of size." She mused. The giant fox turned her head away as if in thought before she let out an amused scoff. "Visitor, I'm going to be honest and tell you something but I ask that it stays between us." Looking back to you the goddess was having trouble keeping eye contact. In fact, she kind of looked flustered. She began to speak again and you noticed that the air of calmness in her voice was gone, now more nervous and shaky. "To put it bluntly, interactions with small beings like you makes me feel strange. Each time a group of visitors is sent back I have many restless nights and even looking at your small form standing before me right now makes my heart flutter!"

"Wait..." You started.

"I know, its unbefitting of the forest spirit to be feeling such things but it's getting increasingly hard to ignore them. I've even tried taking aside some of the kitsunes to... help me work past it... but that didn't work either." She sighed. Her slender muzzle was parted lightly as she quietly panted and you could feel the heat from her breath blowing onto you. "What I'm saying is - and it's perfectly fine if you decline - but I want to play with you." The vixen bashfully brought a paw up to her face as she let out an embarrassed laugh.

By now you knew what she was implying. It would seem that the mountain-sized fox goddess right in front of you was a microphile. You had no idea how 'playing' with such a giant animal would work out and it was clear these emotions of hers had been pent up for quite a while. Things could quite easily get out of hand, but thankfully she gave you a choice. You could feel tremors from her wagging tail as the forest spirit waited for you to decide.

Rubbing your eyes to get the blur from them you realize the blur wasn't going away. Raising a hand up you block the light and see other vehicles scattered about, even a few who had woken before you as they stumbled outside their cars. You soon join them as it dawns on that your hearing seems to be gone as it starts ringing with that going away while you try to make out where you all are. Bright lights shine from high above while a metal tower that was thicker than any you had ever seen before rises into the sky beyond anything man made. It was as your hearing comes back that you start to hear the deep, beating sounds of music that was playing on a level that was beyond loud though you could hear the sounds of voices talking amidst the notes. Languages that weren't understandable while deeper in tone as if from something gigantic.

Thunderous clops echoed from behind everyone, accompanied by a thunderous shout that drowned out the music, the lights training along the ground onto a figure far away. It was a smokey grey stallion that walked on two legs but even more astounding was the figures considerable height that left you looking upwards even from how far away he was. And it was most certainly a he as his tight black underwear clung to his form to hide nothing of his athletic figure. After a few sultry poses he strode forward, his hooves carrying him ever closer with the sound of thunder, from both the music and every clack of those limbs hitting the ground. You were all nothing but crumbs on his stage, the entire convoy of cars able to fit under just one of those massive things.

You needed to leave quickly before he reached the end of the stage where you were all parked.
15533313.title: Stage show

1553333.content: How about some of theses.
1553333.title: Other locations

15533331.content: Where abouts in the centre.
15533331.title: Swimming centre.

155333311.content:
You just couldn’t believe your eyes all around you were giant anthros and you were in some kinda pool area! Exiting your car to get a better look at your surroundings your mouth fell agape from the sheer size of everything you and everybody else who was transported here with you had to be at least half and inch tall.

“What the heck happened?” You wonder as you walked away from your car to get a better look at some of the anthros. A few other people did the same exiting there cars to get a better look. Looking across the ocean sized pool you could see a family of German shepherds “they look almost human” you took a good long look at the family they had the same appearance as a human they even had the exact same type of feet except with pads on the bottom of there soles and toes. From what you could see they also had claws instead of fingernails or toenails.

“Hey over here!” You heard someone shout in the distance, not being able to see over all the cars you climbed on top of one to get a better look. There by the edge of the pool was one your friends and it looked like his girlfriend was with him too! Not wasting anytime you took off running towards your friends jumping over cars and dodging past people until you reached them.

Once you’d reached them you bent over to catch your breath. (Pant) (pant) “Hey man take it easy!” Your friend said as he patted you on the back “what....the he’ll happened?” You asked your friend who just shrugged in reply “no ideas buddy I’m just as surprised as you are.”

While you two where talking a woman screamed back over by the cars. “What’s was that!” Your friend said as you looked over in the direction and to your horror you saw the stomping feet of an anthro.
155333311.title: Pool

1553333113.content:
Looking up from the approaching feet you saw a mass of red scaled with wings folded at the back and two horns. This anthro was a dragon!


The anthro was dressed only in a blue Speedo with a noticeable bulge which confirmed the dragon's gender. You gazed in aww the the defined pecs, six pack, and toned arms and legs of the giant. However looking down you saw the red soled foot continuing it's advance.

Without a second thought you ran forward.
"Hey! Stop!", your friend yelled in horror.

You started waving your hands and yelled.
"Hey down here!"

The dragon..
1553333113.title: Dragon

choices: Smirked and lifted his foot up
15533331131.content:
To your relief, the red foot stopped it's advance landing right in front of you. Upon further inspection you found yourself the size of one of the dragon's black toe claws.

The dragon brought his gaze down to you. He squinted at you before bending over. You couldn't help but stare back into his striking yellow eyes.

The winged beast suddenly began to reach for you. "Watch out!", your friend pleaded.

You felt frozen as the clawed thumb and finger gently grabbed you, covering all of your middle section. The dragon began to bring you to his face allowing you a close up with his abs and pecs.

Arriving at his face, the dragon placed you onto his open palm. You felt warmth from the floor and felt some tinge of comfort.

The dragon's yellow irises started at your form as if daring you to make a move. You started into his eyes feeling as if years are passing by. The fear of being eaten or crushed seem to melt away.

The dragon breaks his gaze first before bringing his attention back down to the rest of the humans. By now, most had turn their eyes to you and the dragon. You noticed a few running off, only to be unknowingly squashed by a passing cat.

The dragon then.......
15533331131.title: Stopped and looked down

1553333114.content: Was the giant anthro heading your way a well muscled male otter wearing only a dark blue speedo?
1553333114.title: An Otter Perhaps?

15533331142.content: How about one of these.
15533331142.title: No, something else.

choices: Walked away with you in hand
155333331.content:
You couldn’t believe what you were seeing all around were massive anthro animals. From what you could tell you Were in a biker bar. The anthros leather jackets and biker gear was a dead give away.

Looking at your surroundings you were on the bar surrounded by a few empty beer bottles and glasses.

Suddenly you heard a woman scream from one of the nearby cars. Wondering what was wrong you looked up and saw the face of a female hyena!

She had a massive scare across her muzzle and she seemed to have a gold tooth. You saw this because the woman’s mouth was wide open, like she’d just seen something amazing.

“Oh shit she’s looking at us.” You said. Slowly you started to back up trying to put as much distance between you and the hyena but your movements didn’t go unnoticed.

You screamed as the hyena reached down and pinched you between her claws and lifted you off the bar.

You could hear and see people running away as the hyena brought you before her face. The hyena woman’s mouth was still wide open. Her rancid breath kept blowing in your face making you gag.

You hyena kept staring at you before she.
155333331.title: Biker bar

1553333311.content:
You screamed and thrashed trying to free yourself. “Please let me go!” You begged looking up at the hyena. The giant creature showed no sign that she heard your cries. The hyena seemed to be heading for the door probably intending to leave with you.

You could only look in horror as the hyena pushed the door open and made her way over to her bike. Before she got any further to the vehicle she suddenly stopped and looked down at you.

You wondered what she was doing at first but the the realisation hit you. “She doesn’t have any pockets!”

The hyena gave a thoughtful look before bringing you to her.
1553333311.title: Walked away with you in hand

15533334.title: Other

155333343.title: Other locations

info.brief_description: A portal takes you and others to a new world populated by giant animals!
info.description:
In this story you're transported via a portal to another world populated by giant animals
these can be anthro or feral, even mythical - Dragons, griffon etc. Or extinct - smilodons, dinosaur etc.

The animals may be capable of speaking (or not).
They may speak in a language not from Earth.
They may dress in clothes (or not).
They may have human thought process or instinctual behaviour.
They may live in cities/towns etc, natural dens etc.
They may have modern technology, future tech or even still be in the stone age.

No giant humans however, the planets are only populated by animals. Though more
humans from Earth may arrive via portal.

New portals may open up, taking you to a new planet or simply relocating you on the one your on - some may even take you back home (end a story)!

Your size comparision can vary from place to place. You may have shrunk or the animals/environment can simply be big! So on one planet you may be an inch tall
next to a wolf yet on another you could be 1/4 of an inch tall in comparision.

Any theme is allowed, just not to over the top please keep this GC and not XGC.

All I ask is please try to be descriptive (no single line chapters), follow the story line, try not to create dead ends and finally please try to use correct grammar - doesn't have to be perfect, we all make mistakes.
info.pretty_title: Taken to the Worlds of Giant Animals
